    • Uses of RenderState in sage.renderer

      Methods in sage.renderer that return RenderState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderState IRenderer.createRenderState(RenderState.RenderStateType type)
      Creates a RenderState object of the specified type.
      RenderState RenderContext.getCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType stateType)
      Returns the specified RenderState of this RenderContext.
      RenderState IRenderer.getDefaultRenderState(RenderState.RenderStateType renderStateType)
      Returns the default RenderState for the specified RenderState.RenderStateType.
      RenderState AbstractRenderer.getDefaultRenderState(RenderState.RenderStateType renderStateType)
      Returns the default RenderState for the specified RenderState.RenderStateType.
      Methods in sage.renderer with parameters of type RenderState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RenderContext.setCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType type, RenderState state)
      Assigns the specified RenderState as the current state for the specified RenderState.RenderStateType in this RenderContext.

    • Uses of RenderState in sage.scene

      Methods in sage.scene that return RenderState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderState SceneNode.getRenderState(RenderState.RenderStateType type)
      Returns the requested RenderState that this SceneNode currently has set, or null if none is set.
      RenderState[] SceneNode.getRenderStates()
      Returns an array containing the RenderStates current set in this SceneNode.
      RenderState SceneNode.setRenderState(RenderState rs)
      setRenderState attaches a RenderState object to this SceneNode.
      Methods in sage.scene with parameters of type RenderState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderState SceneNode.setRenderState(RenderState rs)
      setRenderState attaches a RenderState object to this SceneNode.

    • Uses of RenderState in sage.scene.state

      Subclasses of RenderState in sage.scene.state 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlendState
      BlendState maintains the state of the blending values of a particular node and its children.
      class  TextureState
      TextureState maintains the texture state for a given SceneNode.
      class  ZBufferState
      ZBufferState is an abstract description of one particular kind of RenderState: state information associated with the Z-Buffer, also called the Depth Buffer, in a graphics API-specific IRenderer implementation.

    • Uses of RenderState in sage.scene.state.jogl

      Subclasses of RenderState in sage.scene.state.jogl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JOGLBlendState
      JOGLBlendState subclasses the BlendState using the JOGL API to set OpenGL's blending state params.
      class  JOGLTextureState
      JOGLTextureState provides a JOGL API implementation of the abstract class TextureState.
      class  JOGLZBufferState 

    • Uses of RenderState in sage.terrain

      Methods in sage.terrain that return RenderState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderState TerrainPage.setRenderState(RenderState rs)
      setRenderState attaches a RenderState object to each child of this TerrainPage, recursively, so that that specified RenderState becomes the RenderState for the bottom-level TerrainBlocks of this TerrainPage.
      Methods in sage.terrain with parameters of type RenderState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderState TerrainPage.setRenderState(RenderState rs)
      setRenderState attaches a RenderState object to each child of this TerrainPage, recursively, so that that specified RenderState becomes the RenderState for the bottom-level TerrainBlocks of this TerrainPage.
